description.german: Wählt Hatschepsuts Uraltes Vermächtnis aus und entsendet eine Handelsmission in jedes Reich.
description.italian: Dato che hai scelto l'Antico retaggio di Hatshepsut, invia una missione commerciale a ogni regno.
description.koreana: 하트셉수트의 고대 유산을 선택하고 모든 영역에 교역 임무를 보내십시오.
description.polish: Po wybraniu starożytnego dziedzictwa Hatszepsut wyślij misję handlową do każdej krainy.
description.russian: Having chosen Hatshepsut's Ancient Legacy, send a trade mission to every realm.
description.schinese: 选择哈特谢普苏特的古代遗产，向各个邦国派遣贸易使团。
description.spanish: Habiendo elegido el legado antiguo de Hatshepsut, envía una misión de comercio a todos los reinos.
description.tchinese: 你已選擇了哈特謝普蘇特的古老傳承，對所有領域指派貿易任務。
description.turkish: Hatşepsut'un Kadim Mirası'nı seçtikten sonra, her diyara bir ticaret misyonu gönderin.

description.brazilian: Tendo escolhido o Legado Antigo de Cufu, conclua cada uma das Maravilhas disponíveis.
description.czech: Dokonči všechny dostupné zázraky po výběru Chufuova starobylého dědictví.
description.english: Having chosen Khufu's Ancient Legacy, complete each available Wonder.
description.french: Érigez toutes les merveilles disponibles en ayant choisi l'héritage antique de Khéops.
description.german: Wählt Cheops’ Uraltes Vermächtnis aus und stellt alle verfügbaren Wunder fertig.
description.italian: Dato che hai scelto l'Antico retaggio di Cheope, completa tutte le meraviglie disponibili.
description.koreana: 쿠푸의 고대 유산을 선택하고 사용 가능한 각 불가사의를 완성하십시오.
description.polish: Po wybraniu starożytnego dziedzictwa Cheopsa zbuduj wszystkie dostępne cuda.
description.russian: Having chosen Khufu's Ancient Legacy, complete each available Wonder.
description.schinese: 选择胡夫的古代遗产，建成各个可用的奇观。
description.spanish: Habiendo elegido el legado antiguo de Keops, completa todas las maravillas disponibles.
description.tchinese: 你已選擇了古夫的古老傳承，完成所有可建造的奇觀。
description.turkish: Keops'un Kadim Mirası'nı seçtikten sonra, tamamlanabilecek her Dünya Harikasını tamamlayın.

description.brazilian: Tendo escolhido o Legado Antigo de Tutemés, use uma ação de sabotagem, apoio e equilíbrio antes de conquistar o povoado-alvo.
description.czech: Před dobytím cílové osady použij akci sabotáže, podpory a rovnováhy po výběru Thutmoseho starobylého dědictví.
description.english: Having chosen Thuthmose's Ancient Legacy, use a sabotage, support and balance action before conquering the targeted settlement
description.french: Utilisez des actions de sabotage, de soutien et d'équilibre avant de conquérir la colonie ciblée en ayant choisi l'héritage antique de Thoutmôsis.
description.german: Wählt Thutmosis’ Uraltes Vermächtnis aus und nutzt eine Aktion der Sabotage, der Unterstützung und des Gleichgewichts, bevor Ihr die anvisierte Siedlung einnehmt.
description.italian: Dato che hai scelto l'Antico retaggio di Thutmose, usa un'azione sabotaggio, supporto ed equilibrio prima di conquistare l'insediamento bersaglio.
description.koreana: 투트모세의 고대 유산을 선택하고 정착지를 점령하기 전에 방해와 지원, 균형 공작을 한 번씩 사용하십시오.
description.polish: Po wybraniu starożytnego dziedzictwa Totmesa użyj akcji sabotażu, wsparcia i zaprowadzenia własnych porządków przed podbiciem wybranej osady.
description.russian: Having chosen Thuthmose's Ancient Legacy, use a sabotage, support and balance action before conquering the targeted settlement
description.schinese: 选择图特摩斯的古代遗产，在征服目标村镇之前使用蓄意破坏、支援和平衡行动。
description.spanish: Habiendo elegido el legado antiguo de Tutmosis, usa una acción de sabotaje, apoyo y equilibrio antes de conquistar el asentamiento objetivo.
description.tchinese: 選擇圖特摩斯的古老傳承，並在征服目標聚落前使用破壞、支援和平衡行動。
description.turkish: Thutmose'nin Kadim Mirası'nı seçtikten sonra hedeflenen yerleşim yerini fethetmeden önce bir sabotaj, destek ve denge eylemi kullanın

description.brazilian: Tendo escolhido o Legado Antigo de Muatal, atinja o nível máximo com 3 vassalos.
description.czech: Vylepši 3 vazaly na maximální úroveň po výběru Muwatalliho starobylého dědictví.
description.english: Having chosen Muwatalli's Ancient Legacy, max out 3 vassals.
description.french: Améliorez 3 vassaux au maximum en ayant choisi l'héritage antique de Muwatalli.
description.german: Wählt Muwattallis Uraltes Vermächtnis aus und verbessert 3 Vasallen bis zum Maximum.
description.italian: Dato che hai scelto l'Antico retaggio di Muwatalli, potenzia al massimo 3 vassalli.
description.koreana: 무와탈리의 고대 유산을 선택하고 속국 3개를 두십시오.
description.polish: Po wybraniu starożytnego dziedzictwa Muwatallego osiągnij najwyższy poziom stosunków z 3 wasalami.
description.russian: Having chosen Muwatalli's Ancient Legacy, max out 3 vassals.
description.schinese: 选择穆瓦塔利的古代遗产，拥有多达3个附庸国。
description.spanish: Habiendo elegido el legado antiguo de Muwatalli, sube al nivel máximo a 3 vasallos.
description.tchinese: 選擇穆瓦塔里的古老傳承，並擁有多達3個藩屬國。
description.turkish: Muvatalli'nin Kadim Mirası'nı seçtikten sonra, 3 vasalı azami seviyeye çıkarın.

description.brazilian: Tendo escolhido o Legado Antigo de Tudália, tenha 5 príncipes.
description.czech: Získej 5 princů po výběru Tudhaliyova starobylého dědictví.
description.english: Having chosen Tudhaliya's Ancient Legacy, have 5 princes.
description.french: Comptez 5 princes dans votre faction en ayant choisi l'héritage antique de Tudhaliya.
description.german: Wählt Tudhaliyas Uraltes Vermächtnis und besitzt 5 Prinzen.
description.italian: Dato che hai scelto l'Antico retaggio di Tudhaliya, ottieni 5 principi.
description.koreana: 투드할리야의 고대 유산을 선택하고 군주를 5명 두십시오.
description.polish: Po wybraniu starożytnego dziedzictwa Tudhalii posiadaj 5 książąt.
description.russian: Having chosen Tudhaliya's Ancient Legacy, have 5 princes.
description.schinese: 选择图达里亚的古代遗产，拥有5个封侯。
description.spanish: Habiendo elegido el legado antiguo de Tudhaliya, ten 5 príncipes.
description.tchinese: 選擇圖特哈里的古老傳承，並擁有5個封侯。
description.turkish: Tudhaliya'nın Kadim Mirası'nı seçtikten sonra, 5 prense sahip olun.

description.brazilian: Jogando como qualquer Líder de Facção, escolha o Legado Antigo de Aquenáton e alcance o mais alto grau de Graça com Aton.
description.czech: Při hře za libovolného vůdce frakce si vyber Achnatonovo starobylé dědictví a dosáhni nejvyšší úrovně přízně s Atonem.
description.english: Playing as any Faction Leader, choose Akhenaten's Ancient Legacy and reach the highest tier of Favour with Aten.
description.french: En jouant n'importe quel dirigeant, choisissez l'héritage antique d'Akhenaton et atteignez le plus haut niveau de faveur avec Aton.
description.german: Spielt als beliebiger Fraktionsanführer, wählt Echnatons Uraltes Vermächtnis aus und erreicht den höchsten Gunstrang bei Aton.
description.italian: Nei panni di un leader di fazione, scegli l'Antico retaggio di Akhenaton e raggiungi il grado di Favore più alto con Aton.
description.koreana: 아무 세력 지도자로나 플레이하면서 아케나텐의 고대 유산을 선택하고 아텐의 가장 높은 총애 단계에 도달하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako dowolny przywódca frakcji, wybierz starożytne dziedzictwo Echnatona i osiągnij najwyższy stopień przychylności Atona.
description.russian: Playing as any Faction Leader, choose Akhenaten's Ancient Legacy and reach the highest tier of Favour with Aten.
description.schinese: 扮演任意派系领袖，选择阿赫那顿的古代遗产并达到最高阶的阿顿眷顾值。
description.spanish: Jugando como líder de cualquier facción, elige el legado antiguo de Akenatón y alcanza la categoría más alta de favor con Atón.
description.tchinese: 扮演任何派系領袖，並且選擇阿肯納頓的古老傳承，向阿頓領受最高階級的恩惠。
description.turkish: Herhangi bir Fraksiyon Lideri olarak oynarken Akhenaton'un Kadim Mirası'nı seçin ve Aton ile en yüksek Lütuf kademesine ulaşın.

description.brazilian: Jogando como qualquer Líder de Facção, conquiste a vitória em uma campanha sem assinar nenhum tratado diplomático.
description.czech: Ve hře za libovolného vůdce frakce dosáhni vítězství v kampani bez podepsání jakýchkoli diplomatických dohod.
description.english: Playing as any Faction Leader, achieve victory in a campaign without signing a single diplomatic treaty.
description.french: En jouant n'importe quel chef de faction, atteignez la victoire en campagne sans signer un seul traité diplomatique.
description.german: Spielt als beliebiger Fraktionsanführer und erringt in einer Kampagne den Sieg, ohne ein einziges diplomatisches Abkommen zu unterzeichnen.
description.italian: Nei panni di un leader di fazione, trionfa in una campagna senza aver firmato nessun trattato diplomatico.
description.koreana: 아무 세력 지도자로 플레이하면서 외교 조약을 단 한 번도 맺지 않고 캠페인 승리를 거두십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako dowolny przywódca frakcji, wygraj kampanię bez podpisywania umów dyplomatycznych.
description.russian: Playing as any Faction Leader, achieve victory in a campaign without signing a single diplomatic treaties.
description.schinese: 以任何派系领导的角色身份进行游戏，在一场战役中取得胜利，而不签署外交条约。
description.spanish: Jugando como líder de cualquier facción, logra la victoria en una campaña sin firmar ni un solo tratado diplomático.
description.tchinese: 扮演任意派系領袖，在沒有簽屬任何外交協議的情況下贏得一場戰役。
description.turkish: Herhangi bir Fraksiyon Lideri olarak oynarken, seferde tek bir diplomatik antlaşma imzalamadan zafere ulaşın.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Bai, declare guerra contra 2 aliados e conquiste as terras deles.
description.czech: Ve hře za Beje vyhlas válku 2 spojencům a ovládni jejich území.
description.english: Playing as Bay, declare war on 2 allies and conquer their lands.
description.french: En jouant Bay, déclarez la guerre à 2 alliés et capturez leurs terres.
description.german: Spielt als Bay, erklärt 2 Verbündeten den Krieg und erobert ihre Länder.
description.italian: Nei panni di Bay, dichiara guerra a 2 alleati e conquistane le terre.
description.koreana: 베이로 플레이하면서 2개 동맹국에 선전포고하고 그들의 땅을 정복하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Baj, wypowiedz wojnę 2 sojusznikom i podbij należące do nich ziemie.
description.russian: Playing as Bay, declare war on 2 allies and conquer their lands.
description.schinese: 以贝的角色身份进行游戏，向2个盟友宣战并征服他们的土地。
description.spanish: Jugando como Bay, declara la guerra a dos aliados y conquista sus territorios.
description.tchinese: 扮演貝伊，對2個盟友宣戰並征服他們的土地。
description.turkish: Bay olarak oynarken, 2 müttefike savaş açın ve onların topraklarını fethedin.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Bai, torne-se Faraó e use o Poder de Presença na Corte para assumir o controle total da Corte.
description.czech: Ve hře za Beje se staň faraónem a použij schopnost „Přítomnost u dvora“ k převzetí kontroly nad celým dvorem.
description.english: Playing as Bay, become Pharaoh and use the Court Presence Power to take control of the entire court.
description.french: En jouant Bay, devenez pharaon et utilisez Présence à la cour pour prendre le contrôle de la cour entière.
description.german: Spielt als Bay, werdet Pharao und nutzt die Hofpräsenz-Kraft, um die Kontrolle über den gesamten Hof zu übernehmen.
description.italian: Nei panni di Bay, diventa faraone e sfrutta il potere Presenza a corte per prendere il controllo dell'intera corte.
description.koreana: 베이로 플레이하면서 파라오가 되어 요직 하사의 권능을 사용해 궁정 전체를 장악하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Baj, zostań faraonem i wykorzystaj moc „Obecność na dworze”, by przejąć kontrolę nad całym dworem.
description.russian: Playing as Bay, become Pharaoh and use the Court Presence Power to take control of the entire court.
description.schinese: 以贝的角色身份进行游戏，成为法老并用王庭影响力控制整个王庭。
description.spanish: Jugando como Bay, conviértete en faraón y usa el poder Presencia en la corte para hacerte con el control de toda la corte.
description.tchinese: 扮演貝伊、成為法老，並且利用「進宮」權能掌控整個宮廷。
description.turkish: Bay olarak oynarken Firavun olun ve tüm sarayın denetimini ele geçirmek için Saray Mevcudiyeti Gücünü kullanın.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Bai, tenha 4 vassalos sob seu controle.
description.czech: Ve hře za Beje ovládej 4 vazaly.
description.english: Playing as Bay, have 4 vassals under your control.
description.french: En jouant Bay, possédez 4 vassaux sous votre coupe.
description.german: Spielt als Bay und habt 4 Vasallen unter Eurer Kontrolle.
description.italian: Nei panni di Bay, detieni il controllo su 4 vassalli.
description.koreana: 베이로 플레이하면서 4개 속국을 확보하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Baj, miej 4 wasali.
description.russian: Playing as Bay, have 4 vassals under your control.
description.schinese: 以贝的角色身份进行游戏，控制4个附庸国。
description.spanish: Jugando como Bay, ten cuatro vasallos bajo tu control.
description.tchinese: 扮演貝伊，擁有4個藩屬國。
description.turkish: Bay olarak oynarken, denetiminiz altında 4 vasalınız olsun.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Bai, conclua 10 intrigas na Corte hitita.
description.czech: Ve hře za Beje dokonči 10 intrik na chetitském dvoře.
description.english: Playing as Bay, complete 10 Intrigues in the Hittite Court.
description.french: En jouant Bay, terminez 10 intrigues à la cour hittite.
description.german: Spielt als Bay und schließt 10 Intrigen am hethitischen Hof ab.
description.italian: Nei panni di Bay, completa 10 intrighi nella corte ittita.
description.koreana: 베이로 플레이하면서 히타이트 궁정에 암투를 10회 완료하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Baj, ukończ 10 intryg na hetyckim dworze.
description.russian: Playing as Bay, complete 10 Intrigues in the Hittite Court.
description.schinese: 以贝的角色身份进行游戏，在赫梯王庭完成10个密谋。
description.spanish: Jugando como Bay, completa 10 intrigas en la corte hitita.
description.tchinese: 扮演貝伊，在西臺宮廷完成10場密謀。
description.turkish: Bay olarak oynarken, Hitit Sarayı'nda 10 Entrika tamamlayın.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Amenemessés, elimine Seti.
description.czech: Ve hře za Amenmesseho zlikviduj Setiho.
description.english: Playing as Amenmesse, eliminate Seti.
description.french: En jouant Amenmès, éliminez Séthi.
description.german: Spielt als Amenmesse und eliminiert Seti.
description.italian: Nei panni di Amenmesse, elimina Seti.
description.koreana: 아멘메세스로 플레이하면서 세티를 제거하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Amenmes, wyeliminuj Setiego.
description.russian: Playing as Amenmesse, eliminate Seti.
description.schinese: 以阿蒙麦西斯的角色身份进行游戏，消灭塞提。
description.spanish: Jugando como Amenmeses, elimina a Seti.
description.tchinese: 扮演阿蒙麥西斯，擊敗塞提。
description.turkish: Amenmesse olarak oynarken, Seti'yi ortadan kaldırın.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Amenemessés, confedere outras 5 facções.
description.czech: Při hře za Amenmesseho spoj do konfederace 5 frakcí.
description.english: Playing as Amenmesse, confederate 5 factions.
description.french: En jouant Amenmès, confédérez 5 factions.
description.german: Spielt als Amenmesse und konföderiert 5 Fraktionen.
description.italian: Nei panni di Amenmesse, confederati con 5 fazioni.
description.koreana: 아멘메세스로 플레이하면서 5개 세력과 연맹을 맺으십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Amenmes, skonfederuj 5 frakcji.
description.russian: Playing as Amenmesse, confederate 5 factions.
description.schinese: 以阿蒙麦西斯的角色身份进行游戏，联盟5个派系。
description.spanish: Jugando como Amenmeses, confedera cinco facciones.
description.tchinese: 扮演阿蒙麥西斯，並且和5個派系結盟。
description.turkish: Amenmesse olarak oynarken 5 fraksiyonla konfederasyon kurun.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Amenemessés, controle cada povoado adjacente ao Nilo.
description.czech: Ve hře za Amenmesseho ovládni všechny osady ležící u Nilu.
description.english: Playing as Amenmesse, control each settlement adjacent to the Nile.
description.french: En jouant Amenmès, contrôlez toutes les colonies adjacentes au Nil.
description.german: Spielt als Amenmesse und kontrolliert alle Siedlungen, die am Nil liegen.
description.italian: Nei panni di Amenmesse, prendi il controllo di tutti gli insediamenti adiacenti al Nilo.
description.koreana: 아멘메세스로 플레이하면서 나일강 유역에 있는 각각의 정착지를 확보하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Amenmes, kontroluj wszystkie osady sąsiadujące z Nilem.
description.russian: Playing as Amenmesse, control each settlement adjacent to the Nile.
description.schinese: 以阿蒙麦西斯的角色身份进行游戏，控制尼罗河附近的各个村镇。
description.spanish: Jugando como Amenmeses, controla todos los asentamientos adyacentes al Nilo.
description.tchinese: 扮演阿蒙麥西斯，掌控尼羅河岸的所有聚落。
description.turkish: Amenmesse olarak oynarken, Nil Nehri'ne yakın her bir yerleşim yerini kontrol edin.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Irsu, devaste 5 centros de culto.
description.czech: Ve hře za Irsua srovnej se zemí 5 center kultu.
description.english: Playing as Irsu, raze 5 Cult Centres.
description.french: En jouant Irsu, rasez 5 centres de culte.
description.german: Spielt als Irsu und brennt 5 Kultzentren nieder.
description.italian: Nei panni di Irsu, radi al suolo 5 centri di culto.
description.koreana: 이르수로 플레이하면서 교단 중심부 5개를 초토화 시키십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Irsu, zniszcz 5 ośrodków kultu.
description.russian: Playing as Irsu, raze 5 Cult Centres.
description.schinese: 以伊尔苏的角色身份进行游戏，夷平5个祭祀中心。
description.spanish: Jugando como Irsu, arrasa 5 centros de culto.
description.tchinese: 扮演伊爾蘇，摧毀5處崇拜中心。
description.turkish: Irsu olarak oynarken, 5 Kült Merkezi'ni yerle bir edin.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Irsu, devaste 20 Entrepostos.
description.czech: Ve hře za Irsua srovnej se zemí 20 stanovišť.
description.english: Playing as Irsu, raze 20 Outposts.
description.french: En jouant Irsu, rasez 20 avant-postes.
description.german: Spielt als Irsu und brennt 20 Außenposten nieder.
description.italian: Nei panni di Irsu, radi al suolo 20 avamposti.
description.koreana: 이르수로 플레이하면서 전초기지 20개를 초토화 시키십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Irsu, zniszcz 20 posterunków.
description.russian: Playing as Irsu, raze 20 ERS Camps.
description.schinese: 以伊尔苏的角色身份进行游戏，夷平20个前哨。
description.spanish: Jugando como Irsu, arrasa 20 campamentos.
description.tchinese: 扮演伊爾蘇，摧毀20座哨站。
description.turkish: Irsu olarak oynarken 20 Karakolu yerle bir edin.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Irsu, tenha 20.000 de ouro em seu tesouro.
description.czech: Ve hře za Irsua měj v pokladně 20 000 zlata.
description.english: Playing as Irsu, have 20,000 gold in your treasury.
description.french: En jouant Irsu, accumulez 20 000 pièces d'or dans votre trésorerie.
description.german: Spielt als Irsu und habt 20.000 Gold in Eurer Schatzkammer.
description.italian: Nei panni di Irsu, possiedi 20.000 unità d'oro nella tua tesoreria.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Iolau ou Alíates, entre em uma Aliança Militar com todas as outras facções dos Povos do Mar.

description.german: Spielt als Iolaos oder Alyattes und schließt militärische Bündnisse mit allen anderen Seevölker-Fraktionen.

description.koreana: 이올라오스 또는 왈에테스로 플레이하면서 다른 바다 민족 세력 전부와 군사 동맹을 맺으십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Jolaos lub Walwetes, zawrzyj sojusz wojskowy ze wszystkimi pozostałymi frakcjami Ludów Morza.
description.russian: Playing as Iolaos or Walwetes, enter in Military Alliance with all other Sea Peoples factions.
description.schinese: 以伊奥劳斯或沃尔韦特斯的角色身份进行游戏，与其他所有海上民族派系组成军事联盟。

description.tchinese: 扮演伊奧勞斯或阿呂亞泰斯，與所有其他海上民族派系結成軍事聯盟。

description.brazilian: Jogando como Iolau ou Alíates, construa uma Torre Nuraghe ou uma Aldeia Pelesete em cada espaço de Entreposto de uma província que não pertença a você.
description.czech: Ve hře za Ioláa nebo Walweta postav věž Nuraghi nebo vesnici Pelesetů ve všech pozicích pro stanoviště v provincii, kterou nevlastníš.
description.english: Playing as Iolaos or Walwetes, build a Nuraghe Tower or Peleset Village in each Outpost slot in a province not owned by you.
description.french: En jouant Iolaos ou Alyatte, construisez une tour nuragique ou un village Peleset dans chaque emplacement d'avant-poste dans une province qui ne vous appartient pas.
description.german: Spielt als Iolaos oder Alyattes und errichtet einen Nuraghe-Turm oder ein Peleset-Dorf in allen Außenpostenplätzen einer fremden Provinz.

description.polish: Grając jako Jolaos lub Walwetes, zbuduj wieżę Nuragów lub wioskę Pelesetów w każdym miejscu na posterunek w prowincji, której nie posiadasz.

description.italian: Nei panni di Iolao o Aliatte, sopravvivi 20 turni con la civiltà al collasso.
description.koreana: 이올라오스 또는 왈에테스로 플레이하면서 문명의 붕괴 상태로 20턴을 생존하십시오.

description.german: Haltet Eure Fraktion 25 Runden lang auf einer der 4 inneren Positionen der Klingen- und Behausungen-Skalen, nachdem Ihr den Seevölker-Pfad gewählt habt.
description.italian: Dopo aver scelto Percorso dei popoli del mare, mantieni la tua fazione in una delle 4 posizioni più interne degli assi lama e dimora per 25 turni.
description.koreana: 바다 민족의 길을 선택하고 진영을 25턴 동안 칼과 쟁기 척도의 가장 안쪽 4가지 위치 중 하나에 유지하십시오.
description.polish: Wybrawszy ścieżkę Ludów Morza, przez 25 tur utrzymaj swoją frakcję na jednej z 4 skrajnych wewnętrznych pozycji na skali żołnierzy i siedzib.
description.russian: Having chosen Path of the Sea Peoples, keep your faction for 25 turns in one of the 4 innermost positions on the Blades and Dwelling scales.
description.schinese: 选择跟随海上民族之路，使你的派系抵达四个侵攻与安居量表里其中一个最里侧的位置，且保持25个回合。
description.spanish: Habiendo elegido la Ruta de los pueblos del mar, mantén tu facción durante 25 turnos en una de las cuatro posiciones más interiores de las escalas de moradas y combatientes.
description.tchinese: 選擇海上民族之道後，讓派系的武力和安居點數量表維持在最内側4個位置之一25回合。
description.turkish: Deniz Halkları Yolunu seçmişken, fraksiyonunuzu 25 tur boyunca Kılıçlar ve Konutlar ölçeğinin en içindeki 4 konumdan birinde tutun.

description.brazilian: Tendo escolhido o Caminho dos Povos do Mar, mantenha sua facção por 20 turnos em uma das 4 posições mais externas dos eixos de Combatentes e Assentados.
description.czech: Po výběru Cesty mořských národů udrž svoji frakci po dobu 20 tahů v jedné ze 4 krajních vnějších pozic na váhách bodů čepelí a obydlí.
description.english: Having chosen Path of the Sea Peoples, keep your faction for 20 turns in one of the 4 outermost positions on the Blades and Dwelling scales.
description.french: En choisissant la voie des peuples de la mer, maintenez votre faction dans l'une des 4 positions les plus extrêmes des axes Lames et Habitation pendant 20 tours.
description.german: Haltet Eure Fraktion 20 Runden lang auf einer der 4 äußeren Positionen der Klingen- und Behausungs-Skalen, nachdem Ihr den Seevölker-Pfad gewählt habt.
description.italian: Dopo aver scelto Percorso dei popoli del mare, mantieni la tua fazione in una delle 4 posizioni più esterne degli assi lama e dimora per 20 turni.
description.koreana: 바다 민족의 길을 선택하고 진영을 20턴 동안 칼과 쟁기 척도의 가장 바깥쪽 4가지 위치 중 하나에 유지하십시오.
description.polish: Wybrawszy ścieżkę Ludów Morza, przez 20 tur utrzymaj swoją frakcję na jednej z 4 skrajnych zewnętrznych pozycji na skali żołnierzy i siedzib.
description.russian: Having chosen Path of the Sea Peoples, keep your faction for 20 turns in one of the 4 outermost positions on the Blades and Dwelling scales.
description.schinese: 选择跟随海上民族之路，使你的派系抵达四个侵攻与安居量表里其中一个最外围的位置，且保持20个回合。
description.spanish: Habiendo elegido la Ruta de los pueblos del mar, mantén tu facción durante 20 turnos en una de las cuatro posiciones más exteriores de las escalas de moradas y combatientes.
description.tchinese: 選擇海上民族之道後，讓派系的武力值和安居值量表維持在最外側4個位置之一20回合。
description.turkish: Deniz Halkları Yolunu seçmişken, fraksiyonunuzu 20 tur boyunca Kılıçlar ve Konutlar ölçeğinin en dışındaki 4 konumdan birinde tutun.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Iolau ou Alíates, receba 10 Espólios de Guerra por devastar um povoado.
description.czech: Ve hře za Ioláa nebo Walweta získej 10x válečnou kořist za srovnání sídla se zemí.
description.english: Playing as Iolaos or Walwetes, receive 10 War Spoils rewards for razing a settlement.
description.french: En jouant Iolaos ou Alyatte, obtenez 10 butins de guerre en rasant des colonies.
description.german: Spielt als Iolaos oder Alyattes und erhaltet 10 Kriegsbeute-Belohnungen für das Niederbrennen einer Siedlung.
description.italian: Nei panni di Iolao o Aliatte, ricevi 10 bottini di guerra come ricompensa per aver raso al suolo un insediamento.
description.koreana: 이올라오스 또는 왈에테스로 플레이하면서 정착지 초토화로 주어지는 전리품 보상을 10회 받으십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Jolaos lub Walwetes, otrzymaj 10 łupów wojennych w nagrodę za niszczenie osad.
description.russian: Playing as Iolaos or Walwetes, receive 10 War Spoils rewards for razing a settlement.
description.schinese: 以伊奥劳斯或沃尔韦特斯的角色身份进行游戏，通过夷平村镇获得10次战利品。
description.spanish: Jugando como Yolao o Aliates, recibe diez recompensas de botines de guerra por arrasar un asentamiento.
description.tchinese: 扮演伊奧勞斯或阿呂亞泰斯，透過摧毀聚落獲得10件戰利品獎勵。
description.turkish: Iolaos veya Walwetes olarak oynarken, bir yerleşim yerini yerle bir ettiğiniz için 10 Savaş Ganimeti elde edin.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Iolau ou Alíates, assine 5 acordos de paz com facções que não sejam dos Povos do Mar.
description.czech: Ve hře za Ioláa nebo Walweta uzavři 5 mírových dohod s jinými frakcemi, než jsou mořští nájezdníci.
description.english: Playing as Iolaos or Walwetes, sign 5 peace treaties with non-Sea Peoples factions.
description.french: En jouant Iolaos ou Alyatte, signez 5 traités de paix avec des factions autres que les peuples de la mer.
description.german: Spielt als Iolaos oder Alyattes und unterzeichnet 5 Friedensabkommen mit Fraktionen, die keine Seevölker sind.
description.italian: Nei panni di Iolao o Aliatte, sigla 5 trattati di pace con fazioni non appartenenti ai popoli del mare.
description.koreana: 이올라오스 또는 왈에테스로 플레이하면서 바다 민족이 아닌 세력과 평화 조약을 5번 맺으십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Jolaos lub Walwetes, podpisz 5 traktatów pokojowych z frakcjami niebędącymi Ludami Morza.
description.russian: Playing as Iolaos or Walwetes, sign 5 peace treaties with non-Sea Peoples factions.
description.schinese: 以伊奥劳斯或沃尔韦特斯的角色身份进行游戏，与非海上民族派系签署5个和平条约。
description.spanish: Jugando como Yolao o Aliates, firma cinco tratados de paz con facciones que no sean de los pueblos del mar.
description.tchinese: 扮演伊奧勞斯或阿呂亞泰斯，與非海上民族派系簽署5個和平協議。
description.turkish: Iolaos veya Walwetes olarak oynarken, Deniz Halklarından olmayan fraksiyonlarla 5 barış anlaşması imzalayın.

displayName.english: To the Sea We Shall Return
displayName.russian: To the Sea We Shall Return

description.brazilian: Jogando como Iolau ou Alíates, perca todas as suas regiões ocupadas enquanto ainda tem uma Horda.
description.czech: Ve hře za Ioláa nebo Walweta ztrať všechna svoje obsazená území, zatímco ti stále zůstane horda.
description.english: Playing as Iolaos or Walwetes, lose all your occupied regions while still having a Horde.
description.french: En jouant Iolaos ou Alyatte, perdez toutes les régions que vous occupez tout en maintenant une horde.
description.german: Spielt als Iolaos oder Alyattes und verliert all Eure besetzten Regionen, während Ihr noch eine Horde besitzt.
description.italian: Nei panni di Iolao o Aliatte, perdi tutte le regioni occupate pur mantenendo un'Orda.
description.koreana: 이올라오스 또는 왈에테스로 플레이하면서 유목 무리를 하나 남기고 점령 지역을 모두 상실하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Jolaos lub Walwetes, utrać wszystkie okupowane regiony, wciąż zachowując hordę.
description.russian: Playing as Iolaos or Walwetes, lose all your occupied regions while still having a Horde.
description.schinese: 以伊奥劳斯或沃尔韦特斯的角色身份进行游戏，在失去所有领地的同时仍拥有一支游牧群。
description.spanish: Jugando como Yolao o Aliates, pierde todas las regiones que hayas ocupado mientras conservas una horda.
description.tchinese: 扮演伊奧勞斯或阿呂亞泰斯，失去所有占領地區，但仍擁有一支遊牧群。
description.turkish: İolaos veya Walwetes olarak oynarken tüm işgal ettiğiniz bölgeleri kaybedin ama elinizdeki Güruhu koruyun.

displayName.czech: Pohleď na mě a zoufej si!

description.brazilian: Tendo escolhido o Caminho dos Salteadores, use Exibição de Poder 3 vezes.
description.czech: Po výběru Cesty nájezdníků použij 3x Ukázku síly.
description.english: Having chosen Path of the Marauders, use Display of Power 3 times.
description.french: Utilisez Démonstration de puissance 3 fois en ayant choisi la voie des maraudeurs.
description.german: Verwendet 3 Mal „Machtdemonstration“, nachdem Ihr den Marodeur-Pfad gewählt habt.
description.italian: Dopo aver scelto Percorso dei predoni, usa Ostentazione del potere 3 volte.
description.koreana: 약탈자의 길을 선택하고 실력 행사를 3회 사용하십시오.
description.polish: Wybrawszy ścieżkę grabieżców, 3 razy skorzystaj z opcji „Pokaz siły”.
description.russian: Having chosen Path of the Marauders, use Display of Power 3 times.
description.schinese: 选择跟随掠夺者之路，使用3次展示力量。

description.tchinese: 選擇掠奪者之道，並使用展示力量三次。
description.turkish: Yağmacıların Yolunu seçmişken, Güç Gösterisini 3 defa kullanın.

description.french: Utilisez Domination 3 fois en ayant choisi la voie des maraudeurs.

description.koreana: 약탈자의 길을 선택하고 영광의 약속을 3회 사용하십시오.

description.turkish: Yağmacıların Yolunu seçmişken, İhtişam Vaadini 3 defa kullanın.

displayName.french: ... mais les femmes et les enfants aussi !
displayName.german: ... die Frauen ebenfalls ... und die Kinder!
displayName.spanish: ... también las mujeres, ¡además de los niños!

description.french: Utilisez Raser et exterminer 3 fois en ayant choisi la voie des maraudeurs.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Iolau, venere todos os deuses dos Shirdana e alcance o mais alto grau deles.
description.czech: Ve hře za Ioláa uctívej všechna šerdenská božstva a dosáhni jejich nejvyššího stupně přízně.
description.english: Playing as Iolaos, worship all Sherden gods and reach their highest tier.
description.french: En jouant Iolaos, vénérez toutes les divinités shardanes et atteignez leur plus haut niveau.
description.german: Spielt als Iolaos, verehrt alle Scherden-Gottheiten und erreicht ihren höchsten Rang.
description.italian: Nei panni di Iolao, venera le divinità degli Sherdana e raggiungi il grado più alto di ciascuna.
description.koreana: 이올라오스로 플레이하면서 셰르덴의 모든 신을 숭배하고 가장 높은 총애 단계에 도달하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Jolaos, czcij wszystkich bogów Szardów i osiągnij najwyższy stopień ich przychylności.
description.russian: Playing as Iolaos, worship all Sherden gods and reach their highest tier.
description.schinese: 以伊奥劳斯的角色身份进行游戏，信仰所有施尔登神灵，并达到它们的最高阶眷顾。
description.spanish: Jugando como Yolao, venera a todos los dioses shirdana y alcanza su máxima categoría.
description.tchinese: 扮演伊奧勞斯，信仰所有施爾登神祇並提升至最高階級。
description.turkish: Iolaos olarak oynarken, tüm Sherden tanrılarına tapın ve bu tanrıların en yüksek seviyelerine ulaşın.

description.brazilian: Jogando como Alíates, venere todos os deuses dos Pelesete e alcance o mais alto grau deles.
description.czech: Ve hře za Walweta uctívej všechna pelesetská božstva a dosáhni jejich nejvyššího stupně přízně.
description.english: Playing as Walwetes, worship all Peleset gods and reach their highest tier.
description.french: En jouant Alyatte, vénérez toutes les divinités Peleset et atteignez leur plus haut niveau.
description.german: Spielt als Alyattes, verehrt alle Peleset-Gottheiten und erreicht ihren höchsten Rang.
description.italian: Nei panni di Aliatte, venera le divinità dei Peleset e raggiungi il grado più alto di ciascuna.
description.koreana: 왈에테스로 플레이하면서 펠레세트의 모든 신을 숭배하고 가장 높은 총애 단계에 도달하십시오.
description.polish: Grając jako Walwetes, czcij wszystkich bogów Pelesetów i osiągnij najwyższy stopień ich przychylności.
description.russian: Playing as Walwetes, worship all Peleset gods and reach their highest tier.
description.schinese: 以沃尔韦特斯的角色身份进行游戏，信仰所有派莱赛特神灵，并达到它们的最高阶眷顾。
description.spanish: Jugando como Aliates, venera a todos los dioses peleset y alcanza su máxima categoría.
description.tchinese: 扮演阿呂亞泰斯，信仰所有佩萊斯特神祇並提升至最高階級。
description.turkish: Walwetes olarak oynarken, tüm Peleset tanrılarına tapın ve bu tanrıların en yüksek seviyelerine ulaşın.
